name: Card Table
description: Card Table; Jean-François Oeben (French, born Germany, 1721 - 1763, master 1761); Paris, France; about 1760; Oak veneered with tulipwood, kingwood, bloodwood, walnut, holly, maple and green-stained burlmaple; gilt-bronze mounts; 70.5 x 85 x 36.8 cm (27 3/4 x 33 7/16 x 14 1/2 in.); 71.DA.105; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Card Table
medium: Oak veneered with tulipwood, kingwood, bloodwood, walnut, holly, maple and green-stained burlmaple; gilt-bronze mounts
